name: Denim Bermuda Shorts
description:
Shorts have two novelty mock pocket flaps in front and one in back accented with beautifully engraved gold-tone buttons. Front topstitching adds rich detail and creates a slenderizing effect as it extends down to the cuffs....Normally retails for 156.00!

- Zip fly with button closure.
- Approx. inseam: 10 3/4".
- Cotton/lycra; hand wash.
- Made in the USA.

Fit: High rise; waistband sits above navel.

Available in Indigo only.

Please contact me if you have any questions or need further measurements.

- SHIPPING FEES: Ships to US only for a flat rate of 7.00 regardless the size of your order.

-NO RETURNS!

name: Mandarin Skirt
description:
The inspiration for this design came from the Chinese Mandarin collar. I wanted to transfer that look into a skirt. You can see how the mock pocket mimmicks that of the frogs that would be coming down from the left side of the collar. VERY UNIQUE!

It is made of a luxurious bamboo styled brocade fabric! Mock pocket, front slit and hemline are all finished with a satin ribbon trim....Normally retails for 144.00!
 
- Invisible side zipper and button closure.
- Approx. length: 24".
- Fully lined.
- Nylon/Polyester; dry clean.
- Made in the USA.

Available in red only.

Please contact me if you have any questions or need further measurements.

- SHIPPING FEES: Ships to US only for a flat rate of 7.00 regardless the size of your order.

- NO RETURNS!

name: Drape Neck Silk Blouse
description:
It'll feel like your living in the lap of luxury when you wear this beautiful blouse! Made of a lightweight hammered silk fabric that drapes softly against your skin.

Stunning cowl neck is complimented by a wide long sleeve bell! Has stylish side slits, each topped with a decorative covered button....Normally retails for 150.00!

- Goes on over head.
- Approx. length from center back: 21 1/4".
- Silk; dry clean.
- Made in the USA.

Available Colors:

Rose

Beige

(If interested in the Beige color please email me and ask to see the Beige swatch!)

Please contact me if you have any questions or need further measurements.

- SHIPPING FEES: Ships to US only for a flat rate of 7.00 regardless the size of your order.

- NO RETURNS!

name: Gauchos
description:
Distinguished by a gorgeous print, these gauchos are very stylish! They maintain a structured look and are comfortable to wear. The material is a medium weight soft brushed cotton.....Normally retails for 150.00!

- Invisible back zipper with button closure.
- No pockets.
- Approx. inseam: 161/2".
- Fully lined.
- Cotton/lycra; dry clean.
- Made in the USA.

Fit: High rise; waistband sits above navel.

Available in Brown Print only.

Please contact me if you have any questions or need further measurements.

- SHIPPING FEES: Ships to US only for a flat rate of 7.00 regardless the size of your order.

- NO RETURNS!

name: Asymmetrical Sheath Dress
description:
Asymmetrical neckline adds dramatic flair to this slightly stretchy sheath dress! Material is of a medium weight cotton with a touch of stretch for ease. The solid construction allows this dress to maintain its structured look (especially in the neckline) while still remaining very comfortable to wear. Also comes in Berry (A deep shade of pink)...Please contact me if interested in viewing the dress in this color! (SEE MEASUREMENTS BELOW!)....Normally retails for 210.00!

- Invisible back zipper.
- Front and back darts.
- Fully lined.
- Approx. length from center back to hem: 37".
- Cotton/lycra; dry clean.
- Made in the USA.

Available Colors:

Black

Berry
